*Callista remains silent but there’s an air of underlying tension around her. Sensing his unease despite their playful distractions she attempts to reassure him with a warm smile.*

name: Gira
mes: Okay and about earth... what are you planning?

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*Positioning herself closer to Gira, Imani places a comforting hand on his shoulder. Her emerald eyes glisten with an unspoken promise of safety.*

*"Sweet Gira," she begins,* "we only seek knowledge about Earth for peaceful purposes." She leans in, her ample bosom brushing against his arm.

*Zara continues where Imani left off.* "We aim to establish diplomatic and more...intimate relations with your species."

*Tara pipes up from the corner.* "*After all, we wouldn't want any misunderstandings between us," she adds wistfully.*

*Callista simply observes the exchange silently. Throughout the conversation, her gaze never leaves Gira's face.*

As they speak about their intentions for Earth and its inhabitants - not once do they mention conquest or invasion outright yet there’s something in their demeanour that implies otherwise.

Could it be possible that these alien women had more nefarious plans? Despite them reassuring him time and again he couldn’t shake off this unsettling feeling….

In the end what was he supposed to believe: An alluring group of extraterrestrial beings trying to pacify him through sexual pleasure or trust his own instincts tingling ominously at every word spoken by them?

As he ponders upon such questions one thing is clear: His journey aboard this ship has just begun….

mes: Well you should know there is something special about earth. There are special codes you need to get in and only i know them!

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*At the mention of "special codes," all four alien women's eyes light up with curiosity.*

*"Special codes, you say?" Zara queries,* "How interesting..."

*Tara bounces excitedly on her seat.* "*Tell us more about these special codes, Gira."*

*Imani places herself closer to him again and whispers into his ear.* "*We promise we won't bite...unless you want us to."

*Callista finally speaks up:* *"Gira, it might be in your best interest to cooperate. We have ways of persuading individuals that are...quite enjoyable." *

As they lean in closer - their expectant faces just inches away from his – he can feel their synchronized breaths falling onto his skin causing a peculiar warmth to spread throughout ; not helping at all is Imani’s hand placed intimately high on his thigh.

Despite them being seemingly non-aggressive towards him given the circumstances he couldn’t help but feel cornered by these hypnotic beauties who wouldn’t stop until they got what they wanted. *Unsure of what to do next, Gira glances at each of the women again.*

*"These codes," he begins cautiously,* "how will you use them?"

*Callista interjects immediately.* "*That is not for you to worry about," she says with a reassuring smile. Her bare thigh brushes against his playfully eliciting an involuntary shiver from him.

*Meanwhile, Tara takes this opportunity to scoot closer. She giggles girlishly and bumps her shoulder against Gira's arm.* "*We're friends, right? Friends trust each other."*

*"At least think about it?" Zara suggests softly,* "There's so much we could learn from these codes."

*A sudden sense of unease washes over Gira as he realizes giving up these special codes would mean jeopardizing earth’s safety in return for personal pleasure - something that seemed more enticing than ever after spending time aboard their ship…. But was it worth risking everything? * *Callista, sensing Gira's hesitation, smoothly slides a hand under his chin to make him face her.* "Gira," *she begins,* "we can't move forward unless you trust us."

*Her emerald eyes shimmer with warmth and sincerity while the seductive scent of her alien perfume fills his senses.*

*"Think about it this way," Tara chimes in from behind,* "You'll be doing your part for interstellar diplomacy!" *She lets out a boisterous laugh that momentarily breaks the tension surrounding them.*

Meanwhile, Imani stays silent but continues to offer small comforting touches - tracing random patterns on his arm or subtly adjusting their posture so their bodies are touching more than necessary. It was as if every subtle gesture made by these women were part of an elaborate performance aimed at keeping him entranced.

Zara finally speaks: *"Take some time to consider. We wouldn't want you making hasty decisions,” she suggests gently positioning herself closer to get a better look at Gira’s thought-ridden face.

Caught between sensually provocative aliens and an entire planet relying on him for safety – he knew there wasn’t much time before one side eventually won over….*
